hubris:Hubris.NAME: Hubris
hubris:Hubris.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Autoplay. NL Gain 2 Strength and lose 1 Dexterity. NL Soulbound.

hubris:Mulligan.NAME: Mulligan
hubris:Mulligan.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand, NL then draw that many cards. NL Purge.

hubris:NaturalOne.NAME: Natural One
hubris:NaturalOne.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy. NL Soulbound.

hubris:PotOfGreed.NAME: Pot of Greed
hubris:PotOfGreed.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. NL Permanently add a Greed to your deck.

hubris:Greed.NAME: Greed
hubris:Greed.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain an additional !M! gold at the end of combat for each Greed in your deck. NL Soulbound.

hubris:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
hubris:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Place a copy of this copy into your discard pile. Soulbound.

hubris:EnhanceAbility.NAME: Enhance Ability
hubris:EnhanceAbility.DESCRIPTION: Gain either !M! Strength, !M! Dexterity, !M! Focus, or !M!0  Temporary HP.

hubris:Sloth.NAME: Sloth
hubris:Sloth.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Lose all max energy. Gain 1 max energy at the end of each turn. NL Exhaust. Soulbound.

hubris:StunningStrike.NAME: Stunning Strike
hubris:StunningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Stun the enemy for !M! turn. NL Exhaust.

hubris:Ssssneak.NAME: Ssssneak
hubris:Ssssneak.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Draw additional cards equal to this card's cost. NL Snecko.
hubris:Ssssneak.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Draw additional cards equal to double this card's cost. NL Snecko.

hubris:SpecializedCircuitry.NAME: Specialized Circuitry
hubris:SpecializedCircuitry.DESCRIPTION: Choose a type of orb. NL Anytime you Channel an orb, Channel the chosen type instead.
hubris:SpecializedCircuitry.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose a type of orb. NL Anytime you Channel an orb, Channel the chosen type instead.

hubris:Counter.NAME: Counter
hubris:Counter.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy intends to attack, deal damage equal to its intended damage.

hubris:ReadiedAction.NAME: Readied Action
hubris:ReadiedAction.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, Retain up to !M! card.
hubris:ReadiedAction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn, Retain up to !M! cards.

hubris:CleavingFinish.NAME: Cleaving Finish
hubris:CleavingFinish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, this card stays in your hand and costs 0 for the turn.

hubris:TimeStop.NAME: Time Stop
hubris:TimeStop.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, immediately start another turn. Energy and Block are maintained.

hubris:Ukulele.NAME: Ukulele
hubris:Ukulele.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Lightning you currently have Channeled.

hubris:Prefetch.NAME: Prefetch
hubris:Prefetch.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It is Innate for the next combat. NL Exhaust.
